title: id.Anthology.(Limited.Edition.Box.Set).(4CD).(MDF)
description:
id.Anthology.(Limited.Edition.Box.Set).(4CD).(MDF)


id Anthology, released in 1996, while not a game it&#039;s a collection of all the games id software have made up to Quake, it also has a bunch of fun stuff in the box, like a poster, comic, tshirt and a model cyberdemon. 

id Anthology has 19 games on 4 cds, the first cd has the games id software made from 1991 to 1993 this includes all the Commander Keen games, both Wolfenstein games, and really early games like Dangerous Dave and Soldax. Commander Keen: Aliens ate my Babysitter is only the cga version. 
The second cd titled &#039;Doom&#039; has The Ultimate Doom, Doom2, Master Levels and Final Doom. Master Levels doesn&#039;t include Maximum Doom on the &#039;Doom&#039; cd but it does on the &#039;Mac&#039; cd. All the Doom games apart from Master Levels have both the dos and Doom95 versions of v1.9 (the latest). Master Levels comes with a dos launcher &#039;doomit&#039; v9.5c where you can load the .wad files from. The &#039;Doom&#039; cd also has a copy of DirectX 4, Dwango95 and xband. 
The third cd &#039;Quake&#039; has Quake on it with the audio cd music. The forth cd &#039;Mac&#039; has Mac versions of Wolfenstein 3D, Ultimate Doom, Doom2 and Final Doom 

Also included in id Anthology is &#039;The Book of id&#039; a book that is a part of the 4cd case and has a story about id software and starts off "I&#039;ve run out of ammo. Nothing much left between me and Them but this fire door...", a poster of someone screaming against a length of film, a phone card with a picture of the Doom 2 boss on it, two dog tags with the id logo on one and the id anthology logo on the other, a led cyberdemon miniature (unpainted, no paint included), a black t-shirt with the id anthology logo on it, and a Doom comic book. The Game manuals are on the cds and are viewed with omoplay. 

Games Included: 

CD 1 &#039;Vintage&#039; 
Dangerous Dave 
Soldax 
Shadow Knights 
The Catacomb 
Rescue Rover 
Rescue Rover 2 
Hover Tank 3D 
Catacombs 3D 
Commander Keen: Invasion of the Vorticons 
Commander Keen: Keen Dreams 
Commander Keen: Goodbye Galaxy 
Commander Keen: Aliens ate my Babysitter 
Wolfenstein 3D 
Wolfenstein: Spear of Destiny 

CD 2 &#039;Doom&#039; 
Ultimate Doom 
Doom 2 
Master Levels for Doom 2 
Final Doom 

CD 3 &#039;Quake&#039; 
Quake 

CD 4 &#039;Mac&#039; 
Wolfenstein 3D 
Ultimate Doom 
Doom 2 
Final Doom 



Also included, covers & The Book Of id

Enjoy this rare collection !
And SEED please !!! :-)
